name: WARPCOP III
description:
Available on iOS through the app store!

WARPCOP III is a top down, 2D, epic game of cop golf justice. Race against time in the pursuit of Ultimate Justice.

Warp through time and space blasting robots with your laser shotgun in this cheesy 80s mobile game. WARPCOP will not rest until the Crime Overlord Danielle is brought to justice. You must swipe your way through levels, dodging enemy lasers and mines, but you are always one step behind Danielle...

Hone your skills in WARPCOP III's campaign before heading into the level editor to create some custom challenges. Share you creations with the community and download other player's maps all within the app. Test your skill against the world!
